member.name: F:Aequus.AequusPlayer.itemCooldownMax
member.summary: When a new cooldown is applied, this gets set to the duration of the cooldown. Does not tick down unlike

member.name: F:Aequus.AequusPlayer.itemCooldown
member.summary: When above 0, the cooldown is active. Ticks down by 1 every player update.

member.name: F:Aequus.AequusPlayer.itemCombo
member.summary:
When above 0, you are in a combo. Ticks down by 1 every player update.
Item "combos" are used for determining what type of item action to use.
A usage example would be a weapon with a 3 swing pattern. Each swing will increase the combo meter by 60, and when it becomes greater than 120, reset to 0.

member.name: F:Aequus.AequusPlayer.itemUsage
member.summary: Increments when the player uses an item. Does not increment when the player is using the alt function of an item.

member.name: F:Aequus.AequusPlayer.itemSwitch
member.summary: A short lived timer which gets set to 30 when the player has a different selected item.

member.name: F:Aequus.AequusPlayer.interactionCooldown
member.summary: Used to prevent players from spam interacting with special objects which may have important networking actions which need to be awaited. Ticks down by 1 every player update.

member.name: P:Aequus.AequusPlayer.HasCooldown

member.name: M:Aequus.AequusPlayer.SetCooldown(System.Int32,System.Boolean,Terraria.Item)
member.summary:
Sets a cooldown for the player. If the cooldown value provided is less than the player's currently active cooldown, this does nothing.
Use in combination with
member.param: The amount of time the cooldown lasts in game ticks.
Whether or not to ignore cooldown stats and effects. Setting this to true will prevent them from effecting this cooldown
